question: jawaharlal nehru centre for advanced scientific research jakkur campus
vanilla_rag_result: The Jawaharlal Nehru Centre for Advanced Scientific Research (JNCASR) is located at Jakkur, Bangalore, India. It is a multidisciplinary research institute established by the Department of Science and Technology of the Government of India to commemorate the birth centenary of Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru, the first Prime Minister of independent India.
